io.hekate.metrics.local.MetricConfigBase

  • Packages that use MetricConfigBase 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.metrics.local
    LocalMetricsService API.
    io.hekate.spring.boot.metrics.local
    Auto-configuration for ClusterMetricsService.

    • Uses of MetricConfigBase in io.hekate.metrics.local

      Classes in io.hekate.metrics.local with type parameters of type MetricConfigBase 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MetricConfigBase<T extends MetricConfigBase<T>>
      Abstract base class for metric configurations.
      Subclasses of MetricConfigBase in io.hekate.metrics.local 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CounterConfig
      Configuration for CounterMetric.
      class  ProbeConfig
      Configuration for Probe.
      class  TimerConfig
      Configuration for TimerMetric.
      Methods in io.hekate.metrics.local that return types with arguments of type MetricConfigBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<MetricConfigBase<?>> MetricsConfigProvider.configureMetrics()
      Returns a collection of metrics configurations that should be registered within the LocalMetricsService.
      List<MetricConfigBase<?>> LocalMetricsServiceFactory.getMetrics()
      Returns the list of metrics that should be automatically registered during the metrics service startup (see LocalMetricsServiceFactory.setMetrics(List)).
      Methods in io.hekate.metrics.local with parameters of type MetricConfigBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalMetricsServiceFactory LocalMetricsServiceFactory.withMetric(MetricConfigBase<?> metric)
      Fluent-style version of LocalMetricsServiceFactory.setMetrics(List).
      Method parameters in io.hekate.metrics.local with type arguments of type MetricConfigBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LocalMetricsServiceFactory.setMetrics(List<MetricConfigBase<?>> metrics)
      Sets the list of metrics that should be automatically registered during the metrics service startup.
